snippet: As the interim government in Kiev seeks to consolidate its power in the country’s east, a potent information war has emerged between supporters of Ukraine and of Russia.
abstract: Rumors are flying in eastern Ukraine city Donetsk, fueling expectations of war; residents say they have heard that Russian spies have infiltrated the city, or that pro-Ukrainian fighters are hoarding weapons for an attack, or that thousands of Russian citizens have been bused in from across the border to foment riots.
lead_paragraph: As the interim government in Kiev seeks to consolidate its power in the country’s east, a potent information war has emerged between supporters of Ukraine and of Russia.

headline.main: Rumors Mushroom in Eastern Ukraine, Fueling Expectations of War
headline.print_headline: Rumors Mushroom in Eastern Ukraine, Fueling Expectations of War
